lyrics:
"She Fuckin Errbody" lyrics Gucci Mane Lyrics "She Fuckin Errbody" Young nigga came through and he bought a deuce I'm a kick it for him try to take it through the roof A nigga test me and he said I'm food But these chopper bullets are hard to chew (fuck you) Tighter than a Jew, got a bitch from Peru And I'm always out of town so keep me in the loop Salute me or shoot me or move me nigga my young niggas got extendo's too Bullets hitting windows, limo's, bimbo's I'm the type of nigga put a tag on your tempo And my new best friend is my FN and we are not friends so don't pretend-o Pulling up slow with the lights so low Get caught probably never see the sun no more Can't even do a show without a gun no more Make ya say this rap shit ain't fun no more There's something weird about ya (There's something weird about ya) I just can't put my finger on it (I just can't put my finger on it) You ain't like everybody (You ain't act like everybody) And that's that shit that makes me want ya (That's that shit that make me want ya) She fucking errbody (She fucking errbody) She fuck with errbody (Shawty fuck with errbody) She fucking errbody (She fucking errbody) But that's that shit that makes me want ya (That's that shit that make me want her) Niggas ain't seen the shit I saw You the type of nigga that'll call the law I'm the type of nigga that will break your jaw Ride out with your baby ma Nigga is you crazy, bruh? Calling me about your lady, bruh? Must want to go to Grady, huh? My temp fade so crazy wavy I used to trap at Mountain Park I used to stand at Sadie's (Sadie's) Selling dope at Gresham Housing And I didn't even have a car She said she knows me and I'm not no star But why she come in and didn't wear no bra? Why she with me and didn't wear no drawers? Because she never rolled in a Bentley with a chauffeur There's something weird about ya (There's something weird about ya) I just can't put my finger on it (I just can't put my finger on it) You ain't like everybody (You ain't act like everybody) And that's that shit that make me want ya (That's that shit that make me want ya) She fucking errbody (She fucking errbody) She fuck with errbody (Shawty fuck with errbody) She fucking errbody (She fucking errbody) But that's that shit that makes me want ya (That's that shit that make me want her) if ( /Android|webOS|iPhone|iPod|iPad|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Opera Mini/i.test(navigator.userAgent) ) { document.getElementById('azmxmbanner').style.display='block'; document.write('
